title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Youre a source of enlightenment and encouragement for someone close to you today. Ironically, you might not even know how you find the right words to deliver. In fact, you could even feel like youre hooked into an ancestral wisdom thats beyond your own. However, its your compassion for the person that allows the cosmos to flow its insight through you. This magical process feeds your own spirit and soul with inspiration. You can be a fount of understanding more frequently for yourself and others if you make space in your life for cultivating your intuition. Love is the common thread that connects everyone. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
